column1: Discarded Coronavirus Face Masks And Gloves Rising Threat To Ocean Life, Conservationists Warn
I might, just out of sheer orneriness, say that I won't buy #coronabeer because of #COVID19. Any other ornery Americans among that #38percent, do you think?
#ImpeachedForLife is more worried about the stock market than the danger that COVID19, coronavirus, is putting all of us in.
